testcase.name: Holding login button shows the edit url popup
Login button takes us to the login webview
Searching for provider yeilds only one result
Tapping the provider link brings us to the demo login page
Logging in with our dummy user shows the login screen, then inbox
Clicking on the compose icon starts the loading process. Initial templates show.
Clicking on the first template shows the compose screen.

failure.message: Clicking on the first template shows the compose screen.

error.message: AssertionException: "Expected <The following is a test of the Edmonds Community College Mass Notification System. The following is a test of the Edmonds Community College Mass Notification System. If this was an actual emergency, you would receive essential news and information.> but received <An intruder has been spotted on campus>"

testcase.system-out: target.captureRectWithName("{origin:{x:0.00,y:0.00}, size:{height:568.00,width:320.00}}", "Clicking on the first template shows the compose screen.-fail")

testcase.name: Clicking the send button starts the send process. We receive the notification within 10 seconds.

failure.message: Clicking the send button starts the send process. We receive the notification within 10 seconds.

testcase.system-out: target.captureRectWithName("{origin:{x:0.00,y:0.00}, size:{height:568.00,width:320.00}}", "Clicking the send button starts the send process. We receive the notification within 10 seconds.-fail")

testcase.name: Clicking the menu icon shows the slide out menu with the correct details
Clicking the log out button starts the log out process
